resources.string: A personal, visually-driven log for users to catalog interesting urban spots they discover. The focus is on a modern Jetpack Compose UI, robust local data storage, and demonstrating Compose\'s interaction with traditional Android views.
Showcase section to show relations with compose part
Tap "+" placeholder to add photo from camera to a spot!
If you want to add some photos from gallery to spot you absolutely can!
You can view the spot, edit it or delete if don\'t like it anymore.
